effectiveAdvancements.config.title: Effective Advancements
effectiveAdvancements.config.amplify.too: If someone randomly rolls an effect they already have it will amplify it until its at it's maximum amplifier
effectiveAdvancements.config.milk.name: Milk Mode
effectiveAdvancements.config.milk.toolti:
Defines how the player's effects will change when a Bucket of Milk is drunk:
"NO_EFFECT": Nothing changes.
"REMOVE_EFFECTS": Removes all advancement effects from the player.
"REMOVE_DEBUFFS": Removes all debuffs from the player.
effectiveAdvancements.config.death.name: Death Mode
effectiveAdvancements.config.death.toolt:
Defines how the player's effects will change when a player dies:
"NO_EFFECT": Nothing changes.
"REMOVE_EFFECTS": Removes all advancement effects from the player.
"REMOVE_RANDOM": Removes a random buff from the player.
"RANDOM_DEBUFF": Adds a random debuff to the player.
effectiveAdvancements.config.totem.name: Totem Mode
effectiveAdvancements.config.totem.toolt:
Defines how the player's effects will change when a Totem of Undying is activated:
"NO_EFFECT": Nothing changes.
"REMOVE_EFFECTS": Removes all advancement effects from the player.
"REMOVE_DEBUFFS": Removes all debuffs from the player.
effectiveAdvancements.config.advancement: List the advancements that people may get buffs from.
